name.value: eRS Appointment Booking Cancellation Reason Type

description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the Appointment Booking Cancellation Reason.

display.value: A cancellation reason indicating rejection by a service provider.
A cancellation reason classified as initiated by a service provider. This may not indicative of who performed the cancellation.
A cancellation reason classified as initiated by a patient. This may not indicative of who performed the cancellation.
A cancellation reason classified as initiated by a referrer. This may not indicative of who performed the cancellation.
